# search-box-category-suggestions



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The `search-box-category-suggestions` component can be added as a child of an `atomic-search-box` component, allowing for the configuration of category suggestions.

## Properties

| Property                        | Attribute           | Description | Type       | Default     |
| ------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- | ---------- | ----------- |
| `basePath`                      | --                  |             | `string[]` | `[]`        |
| `callbackFunction` _(required)_ | `callback-function` |             | `string`   | `undefined` |
| `delimiter` _(required)_        | `delimiter`         |             | `string`   | `undefined` |
| `field` _(required)_            | `field`             |             | `string`   | `undefined` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part                   | Description                                         |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `"recent-query-clear"` | The 'Clear' button for clearing recent queries    . |
| `"recent-query-title"` | The 'Recent queries' title.                         |
